entry.tran: (版本)缩减的，删节的，截短了的
entry.def: A truncated version of something is one that has been shortened.

example.ex: The review body has produced a truncated version of its annual report.
example.tran: 该评论机构出版了其年报的删节版本。

example.ex: …a rock about eight feet high, shaped like a truncated cone.
example.tran: 高约八英尺，形状像锥台的岩石

sentences.sentence: "her shortened life was clearly the result of smoking"

means.word_mean: 2. terminating abruptly by having or as if having an end or point cut off;
